subject: Baseball
Sporting Goods
Mother's Day
Breast Cancer
lead_paragraph: Other companies are free to produce all-pink bats for Mother’s Day but only Hillerich & Bradsby, the makers of Louisville Slugger, can display its logo on the bats.
snippet: Other companies are free to produce all-pink bats for Mother’s Day but only Hillerich & Bradsby, the makers of Louisville Slugger, can display its logo on the bats.
